Uses of Interface
org.conical.common.bbl.db.querier.DataSourceReference

Packages that use DataSourceReference
Package
Description
org.conical.common.bbl.db.querier
Contains utilities to query a variety of database vendors for information retrieved outside of the SQL spec (typically meta-data).

  • Uses of DataSourceReference in org.conical.common.bbl.db.querier

    Classes in org.conical.common.bbl.db.querier that implement DataSourceReference
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    SimpleDataSourceReference
    Simple implementation of DataSourceReference which uses a DataSourceConfig to access a specific database via the DataSourceFactory.
    Methods in org.conical.common.bbl.db.querier with parameters of type DataSourceReference
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Querier
    QuerierFactory.getQuerier(DataSourceReference dsRef)
    Generates and returns a Querier specific to the database type and ready to access the DataSource contained in the reference class passed.
